title: U.S. Venture Capital Is Pouring Into Canadian Enterprise Tech Startups - The Wall Street Journal
content: U.S. Venture Capital Is Pouring Into Canadian Enterprise Tech Startups  The Wall Street Journal
description: “U.S. funds have been coming across the border aggressively in the last five years, which has helped fuel cohorts of investable companies,” says a lead investor at Georgian, a Toronto-based VC firm.
